extracted_information: This project focuses on the classification of Retinal optical coherence tomography (OCT) images. Its primary objective is to design a system for the identification and classification of OCT Scans from patients suffering from Age-Related Macular Degeneration (AMD) and Diabetic Macular Edema (DME), differentiating them from normal patients. The repository includes project details and the dataset.

features.name: Image Classification
features.description: System for identification and classification of Retinal OCT Scans.

features.name: Disease Differentiation
features.description: Distinguishes between Age-Related Macular Degeneration (AMD), Diabetic Macular Edema (DME), and normal patients.

features.name: Custom CNN Model
features.description: Implementation of a custom Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model for classification.

features.name: Transfer Learning Approach
features.description: Utilizes transfer learning techniques for image classification.

features.name: Project Details Included
features.description: Comprehensive project details are available within the repository.

features.name: Dataset Included
features.description: The dataset used for the project is provided within the repository.
